name: HiTech Alliance LLC
tag_list: software-development, it-outsourcing, java-outsourcing, data-base-support, customer-software-development, php
overview:
We offer Computer Services & Consulting for Any Kind Of Business.

HiTech Alliance provides a full range of project services to our customers: as system analysis, design, development as well as the systems implementation. Our success is ensured by our high level technical specialists in areas of databases, data warehousing, and internet technologies.

Our Mission is to provide close, personal attention to our clients and to guarantee the best meeting of their business needs. Unique experience of our company allows implementing the leading information technologies in the various business areas for our clients success.

Company’s main directions:

* Software Development
* Java outsourcing
* Independent Testing
* Web Development
* Database technical support
* BI solutions
* Software modification and redesign
* Outsourcing

Implemented products:

* Enterprise Platform
* Semantic Analyzer
* Corporate Portal
* Forecasting systems
* Debt Management
* Document Management
* CRM
